description: MainActivity class for an Android application that sets up a TextView with a message generated from splitting, transforming, and capitalizing text.

classes.name: MainActivity
classes.description: An Android activity that sets up a UI and displays a processed message.

methods.name: onCreate
methods.description: Initializes the activity, sets the content view, and updates a TextView with a generated message.

methods.name: buildMessage
methods.description: Constructs a message by splitting, joining, and capitalizing text.
